Plot: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.
Title: Blue Valentine
Writer: Derek Cianfrance, Joey Curtis, Cami Delavigne
Actors: Ryan Gosling, Michelle Williams, Faith Wladyka, John Doman
tomatoConsensus: This emotionally gripping examination of a marriage on the rocks isn't always easy to watch, but Michelle Williams and Ryan Gosling give performances of unusual depth and power.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 50 nominations.
